svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" modified="2023-09-05T16:06:48.469Z" agent="5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/14.6.13 Chrome/89.0.4389.128 Electron/12.0.7 Safari/537.36" etag="IGK_t860LW4oqpYNq8KD" version="14.6.13" type="device"><diagram id="C5RBs43oDa-KdzZeNtuy" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 388px; height: 1px; padding-top: 7px; margin-left: 1px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 380px; height: 1px; padding-top: 33px; margin-left: 6px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 110px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
# sock: int //socket句柄
# family: int //协议簇
# type: int // 类型
# protocol : int //协议
# isConnected: bool //是否连接 # localAddress ：Address::ptr //本地地址
# remoteAddress：Address::ptr //远端地址

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 380px; height: 1px; padding-top: 155px; margin-left: 6px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 558px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
s+ Socket::ptr CreateTCP(...) //创建TCP Socket
s+ Socket::ptr CreateUDP(...) //创建UDP Socket
+ Socket(int family, int type, int protocol) //构造函数
+ int64_t(bool) get(set)Send(Recv)Timeout(...)
//获取（设置）发送（接收）超时时间
+ bool getOption(...) //获取sockopt，调用getsockopt
+ bool setOption(...) //设置sockopt，调用setsockopt
+ Socket::ptr accept() //接收connect链接，并调用init()对其初始化
+ bool bind(...) //绑定地址
+ bool connect(...);//连接地址
+ bool listen(...) //监听socket
+ bool close(...) // 关闭socket
+ int send(...) //调用send, 发送TCP数据
+ int send(const iovec* buffers,...)//调用sendmsg, 发送TCP数据
+ int sendTo(...) //调用sendto, 发送UDP数据
+ int sendTo(const iovec* buffers) //调用sendmsg, 发送UDP数据
+ int recv(...) // 调用recv, 接受TCP数据
+ int recv(const iovec* buffers,...)//调用recvmsg, 接受TCP数据
+ int recvFrom(...) // 调用recvfrom, 接受UDP数据
+ int recvFrom(const iovec* buffers) ////调用recvmsg, 接受UDP数据
+ Address::ptr getRemoteAddress(...) //调用getpeername()获取sockfd对应的远端socket地址
+ Address::ptr getLocalAddress(...) //获取sockfd对应的本端socket地址
+ bool cancelRead() //取消该sockfd的读事件
+ bool cancelWrite() //取消该sockfd的写事件
# void initSock() //设置端口复用，如果为TCP，设置TCP_NODELAY
# init() //在fdManager中注册该sockfd，调用initSock(),getLocalAddress(), getRemoteAddress().

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
